title: If It Comes Down to This….!
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Ai-san, Ai-san. Have you decided on what to do for Respect for the Aged Day?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>That’s it! Ai was gonna ask you about it, Zuramaru-chan~. Ai is still wondering what to do, have you decided yet, Zuramaru-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru is still wondering too zura~. It's this month so Maru thinks Maru needs to make a decision quickly, but….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>What have you done so far?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Umm, Maru has given them a lot of the classic shoulder massage tickets…. But they have never used it even once~. Even though Maru is always ready for them<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>It’s the same for me! My grands don’t really use them too…. Even though Ai gave them hundreds of tickets so they don’t feel worried that they’re going to run out….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru has given them flowers, sweets, teas, and even matching teacups too zura….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hmm-.... Alright, Zuramaru-chan, let’s do a guerilla plan this year!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>A guerilla plan? Maru isn’t really good with dangerous things….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ahaha, sorry, sorry. Ai didn’t mean to make it sound menacing. It’s something like, first, we give them a shoulder and waist massage, then we’ll suddenly take them out to eat anmitsu! When we get back, we give them a back massage using our feet. What do you think?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>So we just do whatever comes to mind, right? Then that might be a good idea~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
